lines.text: Why did you take my son?
One day, i was hunting at the Edge of The World when Tomme appeared and he smiled; and even though you were a Termite Child, I had not the heart to send you back to The Dead World.
Why are they called The Termite People?
They come into The World and chew down all the grandfather trees. Just like termites.
If I tell a man to do what he does not want to do, I am no longer chief.
[forest is being destroyed to make way for a dam]
They are tearing the skin off The World! How will she breathe?
When a dream becomes flesh, trouble is not far behind.
When I was a boy, the edges of the world was very far away, but it comes closer each year.
Can you smell it? The oxygen? 40% of the world's oxygen is produced here in the Amazon.
Come on, Uwe, oxygen doesn't smell. It's... the rot, the decay.
Also the blossoms.
Tomme, I want you to come with me. Momme wants you to come home.
He is finished with mothers. I am his woman now.
You stole my son.
Dadee.
He took you from me, from Momme.
That was long ago.
I just want you to see the home that you came from.
This is my home. It will be the home of my children.
